vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Midianites living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.25.4;
son of: Midian (H4080);
brother of: Ephah (H5891), Epher (H6081), Hanoch (H2585I) and Abida (H0028)
§ Eldaah = "God has known"
a son or descendant of Midian
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Madián, hijo de Queturá, esposa de Abraham
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以勒大 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "神已經知道"
米甸的兒子或後裔
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
以勒大 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "神已经知道"
米甸的儿子或后裔
